snippet.title: Dynablaster (Bomberman) Irem 1991 Arcade Gameplay
snippet.description: You can pick up lots of different power-ups besides extra and bigger bombs. The most usefull is the timebomb which allows you to detonate the bombs when you want to instead of a fixed time period. The flames of a bomb travel only horizontally and vertically. One bomb can detonate any other bomb that is within its blast radius.
